print('test case 2')
import numpy as np
B, C, H, W, nb_size, nb_step, border_mode = 2, 4, 10, 9, (3, 3), (1, 1
    ), 'wrap_centered'
x = tensor.ftensor4()
y = im2col(x, nb_size=nb_size, border_mode=border_mode, merge_channel=False)
f = theano.function([x], y, no_default_updates=True)
X = np.random.rand(B, C, H, W).astype('float32')
Y = f(X)
print('X.shape=', X.shape)
print('Y.shape=', Y.shape)
if X.shape[0] == Y.shape[0] and X.shape[1] == Y.shape[1] and X.shape[2
    ] == Y.shape[2] and X.shape[3] == Y.shape[3] and Y.shape[-1] == nb_size[0
    ] * nb_size[1]:
    pass
else:
    raise ValueError('Shape not consistent')
